sourcesContent:
export const styles = theme => ({
    root: {
        background: theme.palette.white.main,
        height: 0,
        left: 0,
        position: "fixed",
        transition: "height .3s ease-in-out",
        top: 0,
        overflow: "hidden",
        right: 0,
        zIndex: theme.level.fixed
    },
    opened: { height: "100%" },
    overlay: {
        background: theme.palette.backdrop.main,
        bottom: 0,
        left: 0,
        position: "fixed",
        right: 0,
        top: 0
    },
    header: {
        alignItems: "center",
        display: "flex",
        padding: `${theme.spacing(2)}px ${theme.spacing(3)}px`
    },
    logo: {
        marginRight: theme.spacing(2),
        width: "45px"
    },
    userArea: { padding: `0 ${theme.spacing(3)}px` },
    dropdown: {
        boxShadow: "none !important",
        padding: `0 ${theme.spacing(3)}px`
    },
    menuHighlight: {
        borderBottom: `1px solid ${theme.palette.grey[50]}`,
        borderTop: `1px solid ${theme.palette.grey[50]}`,
        display: "flex",
        marginTop: theme.spacing(3)
    },
    menuHighlightItem: {
        flex: 1,
        padding: theme.spacing(2),
        textAlign: "center",
        display: "flex",
        alignItems: "center",
        justifyContent: "center",
        "& + & ": { borderLeft: `1px solid ${theme.palette.grey[50]}` },
        color: theme.palette.text.primary,
        textDecoration: "none"
    },
    dropdownLink: {
        color: theme.palette.text.primary,
        textDecoration: "none",
        minWidth: "100%"
    },
    more: {
        borderTop: `1px solid ${theme.palette.grey[50]}`,
        bottom: 0,
        color: theme.palette.text.primary,
        display: "flex",
        justifyContent: "space-between",
        left: "24px",
        margin: `0 ${theme.spacing(3)}px ${theme.spacing(3)}px`,
        paddingTop: theme.spacing(1),
        position: "absolute",
        right: "24px",
        textDecoration: "none",
        zIndex: 9
    },
    menuList: {
        borderBottom: `1px solid ${theme.palette.grey[50]}`,
        borderTop: `1px solid ${theme.palette.grey[50]}`,
        marginTop: theme.spacing(2),
        padding: "16px 25px",
        display: "flex",
        flexDirection: "column",
        justifyContent: "flex-start",
        alignItems: "flex-start"
    },
    menuListItem: {
        display: "inline-block",
        padding: "7px 0 8px",
        color: theme.palette.common.black,
        textDecoration: "none"
    }
});
